author: ryanM7189TX
title: Hyatt Centric Times Sq
text: Thoroughly impressed with this hotel they took care of us on more than one occasion including an error that I made on the reservation in which they didn't have to correct but did so anyway! Super easy access to tons of attractions and we never had to wait for anything: front desk, food, taxi, etc.
